CustomField.formula: Event__r.Event_Location_Name__c + BR() + Event__r.Event_Location_Address__c + BR()+ Event__r.Event_Location_City__c + ", " + Event__r.Event_Location_State__c + " " + Event__r.Event_Location_Zip__c + BR() + TEXT(Event__r.Event_Location_Country__c)
CustomField.label: Event Location Full
